name: Matthew
introduction:
Hi, I'm Matthew, and I'm a card game veteran with a passion for strategy games. I play video games, listen to music, and have a good time. If you're motivated and looking to have a good time you might find yourself somewhere I'm not happy with.
Kind, outgoing, and funny, I love to laugh and have fun. If you're serious about learning from me just let me know and I'll be right on! You won't be disappointed!
